6// BufferMtl.h:
7// Defines the class interface for BufferMtl, implementing BufferImpl.
8//
9
10#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_BUFFERMTL_H_
11#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_BUFFERMTL_H_
12
13#import <Metal/Metal.h>
14
15#include <utility>
16
17#include "libANGLE/Buffer.h"
18#include "libANGLE/Observer.h"
19#include "libANGLE/angletypes.h"
20#include "libANGLE/renderer/BufferImpl.h"
21#include "libANGLE/renderer/Format.h"
22#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_buffer_pool.h"
23#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_resources.h"
24
25namespace rx
26{
27
28struct DrawCommandRange
29{
30 uint32_t count;
31 size_t offset;
32};
33
34// Inclusive range of consecutive primitive restart value indexes.
35struct IndexRange
36{
37 IndexRange(size_t begin, size_t end) : restartBegin(begin), restartEnd(end) {}
38 size_t restartBegin;
39 size_t restartEnd;
40};
41// Conversion buffers hold translated index and vertex data.
42struct ConversionBufferMtl
43{
44 ConversionBufferMtl(ContextMtl *context, size_t initialSize, size_t alignment);
45 ~ConversionBufferMtl();
46
47 // One state value determines if we need to re-stream vertex data.
48 bool dirty;
49
50 // The conversion is stored in a dynamic buffer.
51 mtl::BufferPool data;
52 // These properties are to be filled by user of this buffer conversion
53 mtl::BufferRef convertedBuffer;
54 size_t convertedOffset;
55};
56
57struct VertexConversionBufferMtl : public ConversionBufferMtl
58{
59 VertexConversionBufferMtl(ContextMtl *context,
60 angle::FormatID formatIDIn,
61 GLuint strideIn,
62 size_t offsetIn);
63
64 // The conversion is identified by the triple of {format, stride, offset}.
65 angle::FormatID formatID;
66 GLuint stride;
67 size_t offset;
68};
69
70struct IndexConversionBufferMtl : public ConversionBufferMtl
71{
72 IndexConversionBufferMtl(ContextMtl *context,
73 gl::DrawElementsType elemType,
74 bool primitiveRestartEnabled,
75 size_t offsetIn);
76 const gl::DrawElementsType elemType;
77 const size_t offset;
78 bool primitiveRestartEnabled;
79 IndexRange getRangeForConvertedBuffer(size_t count);
80
81};
82
83struct UniformConversionBufferMtl : public ConversionBufferMtl
84{
85 UniformConversionBufferMtl(ContextMtl *context, size_t offsetIn);
86
87 const size_t offset;
88};
89
90class BufferHolderMtl
91{
92 public:
93 virtual ~BufferHolderMtl() = default;
94
95 // Due to the complication of synchronizing accesses between CPU and GPU,
96 // a mtl::Buffer might be under used by GPU but CPU wants to modify its content through
97 // map() method, this could lead to GPU stalling. The more efficient method is maintain
98 // a queue of mtl::Buffer and only let CPU modifies a free mtl::Buffer.
99 // So, in order to let GPU use the most recent modified content, one must call this method
100 // right before the draw call to retrieved the most up-to-date mtl::Buffer.
101 mtl::BufferRef getCurrentBuffer() const { return mIsWeak ? mBufferWeakRef.lock() : mBuffer; }
102
103 protected:
104 mtl::BufferRef mBuffer;
105 mtl::BufferWeakRef mBufferWeakRef;
106 bool mIsWeak = false;
107};
108
109class BufferMtl : public BufferImpl, public BufferHolderMtl
110{
111 public:
112 BufferMtl(const gl::BufferState &state);
113 ~BufferMtl() override;
114 void destroy(const gl::Context *context) override;
115
116 angle::Result setData(const gl::Context *context,
117 gl::BufferBinding target,
118 const void *data,
119 size_t size,
120 gl::BufferUsage usage) override;
121 angle::Result setSubData(const gl::Context *context,
122 gl::BufferBinding target,
123 const void *data,
124 size_t size,
125 size_t offset) override;
126 angle::Result copySubData(const gl::Context *context,
127 BufferImpl *source,
128 GLintptr sourceOffset,
129 GLintptr destOffset,
130 GLsizeiptr size) override;
131 angle::Result map(const gl::Context *context, GLenum access, void **mapPtr) override;
132 angle::Result mapRange(const gl::Context *context,
133 size_t offset,
134 size_t length,
135 GLbitfield access,
136 void **mapPtr) override;
137 angle::Result unmap(const gl::Context *context, GLboolean *result) override;
138
139 angle::Result getIndexRange(const gl::Context *context,
140 gl::DrawElementsType type,
141 size_t offset,
142 size_t count,
143 bool primitiveRestartEnabled,
144 gl::IndexRange *outRange) override;
145
146 void onDataChanged() override;
147
148 angle::Result getFirstLastIndices(ContextMtl *contextMtl,
149 gl::DrawElementsType type,
150 size_t offset,
151 size_t count,
152 std::pair<uint32_t, uint32_t> *outIndices);
153
154 const uint8_t *getClientShadowCopyData(ContextMtl *contextMtl);
155
156 ConversionBufferMtl *getVertexConversionBuffer(ContextMtl *context,
157 angle::FormatID formatID,
158 GLuint stride,
159 size_t offset);
160
161 IndexConversionBufferMtl *getIndexConversionBuffer(ContextMtl *context,
162 gl::DrawElementsType elemType,
163 bool primitiveRestartEnabled,
164 size_t offset);
165
166 ConversionBufferMtl *getUniformConversionBuffer(ContextMtl *context, size_t offset);
167
168 // NOTE(hqle): If the buffer is modifed by GPU, this function must be explicitly
169 // called.
170 void markConversionBuffersDirty();
171
172 size_t size() const { return static_cast<size_t>(mState.getSize()); }
173
174 const std::vector<IndexRange> & getRestartIndices(ContextMtl * ctx, gl::DrawElementsType indexType);
175
176 private:
177 angle::Result setDataImpl(const gl::Context *context,
178 gl::BufferBinding target,
179 const void *data,
180 size_t size,
181 gl::BufferUsage usage);
182 angle::Result setSubDataImpl(const gl::Context *context,
183 const void *data,
184 size_t size,
185 size_t offset);
186
187 angle::Result commitShadowCopy(const gl::Context *context);
188 angle::Result commitShadowCopy(const gl::Context *context, size_t size);
189
190 void clearConversionBuffers();
191
192 bool clientShadowCopyDataNeedSync(ContextMtl *contextMtl);
193 void ensureShadowCopySyncedFromGPU(ContextMtl *contextMtl);
194 uint8_t *syncAndObtainShadowCopy(ContextMtl *contextMtl);
195
196 // Convenient method
197 const uint8_t *getClientShadowCopyData(const gl::Context *context)
198 {
199 return getClientShadowCopyData(mtl::GetImpl(context));
200 }
201 // Client side shadow buffer
202 angle::MemoryBuffer mShadowCopy;
203
204 // GPU side buffers pool
205 mtl::BufferPool mBufferPool;
206
207 // A cache of converted vertex data.
208 std::vector<VertexConversionBufferMtl> mVertexConversionBuffers;
209
210 std::vector<IndexConversionBufferMtl> mIndexConversionBuffers;
211
212 std::vector<UniformConversionBufferMtl> mUniformConversionBuffers;
213
214 bool mRestartIndicesDirty;
215 std::vector<IndexRange> mRestartIndices;
216
217};
218
219class SimpleWeakBufferHolderMtl : public BufferHolderMtl
220{
221 public:
222 SimpleWeakBufferHolderMtl();
223
224 void set(const mtl::BufferRef &buffer) { mBufferWeakRef = buffer; }
225};
226
227} // namespace rx
228
229#endif /* LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_BUFFERMTL_H_ */
